1.0.0.name: wordpress/xin
1.0.0.description: XIN is a Mobile First theme based on Foundation 4 Framework. XIN is the moment before sunrise in Chinese. It features a touch-friendly Home Page template and responsive sidebars. XIN supports 2 menu positions, 15 widget area, 7 Page Templates, 3 color scheme and 2 highly customizable widgets. XIN has many easy to use theme options and build-in Google Fonts support. This is the second theme from the author of the popular Voyage theme. Free and professional support at http://www.xinthemes.com/support/
